Key Match Events: The Charlotte Hornets outscored the Indiana Pacers by 29 points in the last 18 minutes of action to win by 20 points.
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Miller gave his thoughts on the current status and future potential of him and his back court running mate LaMelo Ball.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets were playing without three front court players, including two starters and a key reserve.
Others: The Hornets' duo of LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller is unlike anything the city of Charlotte has seen on a basketball court.
